description: From French brachygraphie, from Ancient Greek βραχύς (brakhús, “short”) + -γραφία (-graphía, “writing”).

entries.meaning: (obsolete) A system of writing using abbreviations or special characters; shorthand.
examples: I would for these causes wish him that is melancholy  […]  to impose some task upon himself, to divert his melancholy thoughts: to study the art of memory  […] , or practise brachygraphy, etc., that will ask a great deal of attention  […]
